name: trckshot - a fun, casual, physics puzzle game
name_original: trckshot - a fun, casual, physics puzzle game
description: Get ready to put your problem-solving skills to the test with trckshot, the physics-based puzzle game that will keep you challenged and entertained! In trckshot, you'll use your finger to tap on the screen and drop shapes onto the playfield. The goal is to use the shapes' physics properties, such as mass and friction, to guide them through obstacles and reach the end of each level. The game's colorful graphics and smooth animation make it a joy to play on any device. Can you master the puzzles and become a trckshot champion? Play trckshot now and see if you have what it takes to solve every level!
